```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
dd <- read.csv2("bank-additional.csv")
```

```{r}
colSums(dd=="unknown")
dd[dd=="unknown"] <- NA
dd$pdays[dd$pdays==999] <- NA
colSums(is.na(dd))
sum(is.na(dd))
sum(is.na(dd))/(4119*21)*100
hist(colSums(is.na(dd)), main = "Histograma de Missings", xlab = "Número de valores NA", ylab = "Número de variables", col = 2)
```
